Home Libraries People FAQ More
basic_static_string::assign (1 of 9 overloads)

Assign to the string.

Synopsis 
constexpr basic_static_string&
assign(
    size_type count,
    value_type ch);
Description

Replaces the contents with count copies of character ch.

Complexity

Linear in count.

Exception Safety

Strong guarantee.

Return Value

*this

Parameters

Name

Description

count

The size of the resulting string.

ch

The value to initialize characters of the string with.

Exceptions

Type

Thrown On

std::length_error

count > max_size().
